full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 U. S . Immigration And Naturalization Service Citizenship Branch - 8th Floor, Room 8010 300 N. Los Angeles Street Form Approved mailed Los Angeles, California 90012 OMB No. 43-R0399 7-9-81 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MR, BEN SHAW 452712 817 S. Burlington Ave. , 302 Petition No. Los Angeles, Ca. 90057 A21 203 763 AR # May 26, 1981 Date You are hereby notified to appear for a hearing on your petition for naturaliza- tion before a judge of the naturalization court on June 22, 1981 at Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum (see attached) Please report promptly at M. Your witnesses need NOT come with you. If the judge finds you qualified for naturalization, you will be sworn in as a citizen. YOU MUST BRING WITH YOU THE ITEMS MARKED BELOW: X This letter, WITH ALL OF THE QUESTIONS ON THE OTHER SIDE ANSWERED IN INK OR ON A TYPEWRITER. X Alien Registration Receipt Card. Any Immigration documents you may have. Your child (children): Other D2/I.D.: 849 If you cannot come to this hearing, return this notice immediately and state why you cannot appear. In such case, you will be sent another notice of hearing at a later date. Form N-445 (Rev. 5-6-76)N (SEE OTHER SIDE)
